## Description {#details}

Maps the original instructions to the vectorized instrs and the reverse.

For now an original instr can only map to a single vector.

Definition at line 27 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/instrmaps-h">InstrMaps.h</a>.

### VectorToOrigLaneMap {#ae68e0365546fc58fc843baf3ee4a45f2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;Value &#42;, DenseMap&lt;Value &#42;, unsigned&gt; &gt; llvm::sandboxir::InstrMaps::VectorToOrigLaneMap</>}>
A map from the vector value to a map of the original value to its lane.

Please note that for constant vectors, there may multiple original values with the same lane, as they may be coming from vectorizing different original values.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/instrmaps-h/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/instrmaps-h">InstrMaps.h</a>.
